title: 怎么样才能禁止hat指令
author: 逗中王者
txt_content: 服务器是rpg服，许多玩家把武器戴在投诉，很尴尬了，怎么样才能禁止这个权限

replies.author: Jeffchoy
replies.txt_content:
/mangdelp g:essentials_builder essentials.hat
/mangdelp builder essentials.hat
/mangdelp default essentials.hat
三个都输入， 因为不知道你默认的权限组

replies.author: 我是dalao
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp 默认组名称 -essentials.hat
复制到游戏里就好！

replies.author: 逗中王者
replies.txt_content:
1344566058 发表于 2017-6-30 08:26
/manuaddp default -essentials.hat
貌似不行的

逗中王者 发表于 2017-6-30 10:02
貌似不行的
我输入错了是
/mangaddp default -essentials.hat

replies.author: 逗中王者
replies.txt_content:
Jeff903409880 发表于 2017-6-30 15:01
/mangdelp g:essentials_builder essentials.hat
/mangdelp builder essentials.hat
/mangdelp default ess ...
好像可以了，谢谢老铁

replies.author: 逗中王者
replies.txt_content:
winterWLH 发表于 2017-6-29 12:37
/mangaddp builder -essentials.hat
可以得，很diao

replies.author: Jeffchoy
replies.txt_content:
逗中王者 发表于 2017-7-1 09:52
好像可以了，谢谢老铁
可以了那就麻烦给我评个分和采纳吧谢谢！

replies.author: yuan_kun
replies.txt_content: 进入权限组配置文件config打开用n+编辑器打开alt加f搜索hat那一行去掉重新

replies.author: yuan_kun
replies.txt_content: 启动器服务器不懂加我QQ帮你211719359
